evidence_in_dialogue: [[Brass]] officer clay entered the store unaware of a robbery that was in progress

[[Robbins]] officer clay was killed by a single close-range shotgun blast to the back of the head\nSuspect Jack Delver  NO PERPETRATOR   [[Robbins]] two distant-range , medium-caliber gunshot wounds to the front of the chest , with penetration of the lung and heart
